title: That feel when Riot can't decide which build of Shaco they want to have be used by his players.
body:
\>Riot reworks Shaco
\>AP is too strong because of his 3-item core build involving Gunblade
\>Nerf AP
\>AD Shaco is played instead but he's kind of lackluster comparatively
\>Riot nerfs AD Shaco and buffs AP Shaco in latest PBE Patch

Why can't you MAKE UP YOUR MINDS ON WHICH SHACO BUILD YOU WANT US TO USE?

AAAAAH

I can guarantee that +40% AP ratio, while _extremely needed to make AP Shaco have a semi-decent burst compared to other AP Assassins_, is going to make that build extremely powerful once again simply because Shaco can do the kind of damage he used to do before his AP ratios were gutted. 

He's going to deal _more_ burst damage with his combo than he did before his AP nerfs if that sticks through and he's going to go right back to abusing his core items that nobody cared to really look into fixing. What's worse about this is if the AP ratio included in the Backstab works with +Crit damage through Infinity Edge, we're going to see full AP Shaco's with IE again.

Riot, what are you doing. This isn't the way to change Shaco. You're going to destroy _everything._
